name: io.github.S2TConsulting/accelerators
description: 36 production-ready tools for AWS infrastructure, security compliance, AI workflows, agent orchestration, and ACI governance. Includes IAM/MFA validation, CloudFormation/DynamoDB generation, OAuth validation, vector embeddings, error analysis, data lake readiness, risk classification, task routing, and 12 autonomous governance tools with append-only audit trails.

environmentVariables.name: S2T_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Your S2T Accelerator Platform API key. Get one free at https://dev.s2tconsulting.com/ai-sales/purchase.html

tools.name: s2t_embed
tools.title: Generate Vector Embeddings
tools.description: Generate vector embeddings for text using Amazon Bedrock Titan models. Supports automatic chunking for long documents. Use when building RAG pipelines, semantic search, document similarity, or knowledge base indexing. Returns embedding vectors with chunk metadata.

tools.name: s2t_generate_cloudformation
tools.title: Generate CloudFormation Template
tools.description: Generate production-ready SAM or CloudFormation templates from natural language descriptions. Creates Lambda functions, API Gateway, DynamoDB tables, and S3 buckets with security best practices.

tools.name: s2t_validate_oauth
tools.title: Validate OAuth Configuration
tools.description: Validate an OAuth 2.0 configuration and detect common misconfigurations before deployment. Supports Google, Microsoft, GitHub, QuickBooks, and generic OpenID Connect providers.

tools.name: s2t_validate_iam_policy
tools.title: Validate IAM Policy
tools.description: Validate an AWS IAM policy document for security best practices. Detects overly permissive permissions, dangerous action wildcards, and missing resource scoping. Returns security score (0-100) with categorized findings.

tools.name: s2t_validate_mfa_compliance
tools.title: Check MFA Compliance
tools.description: Validate IAM users and root account for MFA compliance. Checks console access, programmatic access, hardware vs virtual MFA, and policy-level MFA conditions.

tools.name: s2t_generate_dynamodb_design
tools.title: Design DynamoDB Table
tools.description: Generate optimal DynamoDB single-table designs from entity and access pattern descriptions. Returns key schema, GSI recommendations, entity mappings, and deployable CloudFormation template.

tools.name: s2t_analyze_error_patterns
tools.title: Analyze Error Patterns
tools.description: Analyze application error logs to identify recurring patterns, root causes, and trends. Returns categorized patterns with severity and remediation suggestions.

tools.name: s2t_check_data_lake_readiness
tools.title: Assess Data Lake Readiness
tools.description: Assess data lake architecture readiness for production deployment. Evaluates S3 storage, Glue catalog, security controls, query performance, and operational tooling. Returns readiness score (0-100).

tools.name: s2t_classify_action_risk
tools.title: Classify Action Risk
tools.description: Classify an action's risk level as LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, or CRITICAL based on blast radius, reversibility, and target environment. Use for AI agent safety guardrails and graduated autonomy.

tools.name: s2t_route_task_to_agent
tools.title: Route Task to Agent
tools.description: Route a task to the optimal AI agent using semantic similarity matching against 54 specialized agent domains. Returns ranked agent candidates with confidence scores.

tools.name: s2t_predict_system_issues
tools.title: Predict System Issues
tools.description: Predict upcoming system issues by analyzing budget trends, error rates, dependency health, and certificate expiry. Returns prioritized predictions with severity and recommended actions.

tools.name: s2t_attempt_auto_recovery
tools.title: Auto-Recovery Lookup
tools.description: Match an error against known patterns and suggest automated recovery steps. Returns matched patterns with historical success rates and step-by-step recovery instructions.

tools.name: s2t_execute_with_resilience
tools.title: Configure Resilience Pattern
tools.description: Configure resilience patterns (retry with exponential backoff, circuit breaker) for an operation. Returns execution configuration with retry metrics and circuit breaker state.

tools.name: s2t_manage_agent_memory
tools.title: Manage Agent Memory
tools.description: Store, retrieve, search, or delete persistent agent memory with namespace isolation. Use for maintaining agent state across sessions or sharing context between agents.

tools.name: s2t_submit_agent_task
tools.title: Submit Agent Task
tools.description: Submit a task to the SQS FIFO queue for asynchronous multi-agent execution. Returns task ID and queue position for tracking.

tools.name: s2t_create_trace_context
tools.title: Create Trace Context
tools.description: Generate W3C Trace Context identifiers (traceparent + tracestate) for distributed tracing across multi-agent workflows. Returns W3C-compliant trace headers.

tools.name: s2t_acquire_file_lock
tools.title: File Lock Manager
tools.description: Acquire, release, or check file-based mutex locks with stale lock detection. Use to prevent concurrent file access conflicts in multi-agent environments.

tools.name: s2t_validate_cli_readiness
tools.title: Validate CLI Readiness
tools.description: Validate CLI tool availability and API key health on the current system. Returns readiness status per tool with degradation mode recommendations.

tools.name: s2t_catalog
tools.title: List Accelerators
tools.description: List all available S2T accelerators with their capabilities, pricing tiers, and current usage information. Use to discover available tools or review pricing.

tools.name: s2t_usage
tools.title: Get API Usage
tools.description: Get your current API usage statistics and remaining quota for the billing period. Returns requests made, tokens used, remaining quota, and current tier.

tools.name: aci_classify_decision
tools.title: Classify Agent Decision
tools.description: Classify an AI agent action as APPROVE, ESCALATE, or BLOCK. Use before any agent action affecting production, finances, or compliance. Returns classification with confidence score.

tools.name: aci_financial_gate
tools.title: Financial Impact Gate
tools.description: Estimate financial impact of an action and determine if it passes budget gates. Returns cost breakdown, budget impact analysis, and APPROVE/ESCALATE/BLOCK decision.

tools.name: aci_compliance_check
tools.title: Compliance Framework Check
tools.description: Evaluate an action against compliance frameworks (SOC2, GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS). Returns framework-specific violations, warnings, and remediation steps.

tools.name: aci_route_domain
tools.title: Route to Domain Expert
tools.description: Route a governance task to the appropriate domain expert agent(s) with sensitivity tagging and parallel review recommendations.

tools.name: aci_parallel_review
tools.title: Initiate Parallel Review
tools.description: Initiate parallel governance review across multiple domain agents (security, financial, legal, ops, compliance, data). Returns session ID for tracking.

tools.name: aci_synthesize_reviews
tools.title: Synthesize Review Results
tools.description: Collect and synthesize results from a parallel governance review session. Produces a unified APPROVE/ESCALATE/BLOCK decision from individual reviewer assessments.

tools.name: aci_log_decision
tools.title: Log Governance Decision
tools.description: Record a governance decision in the append-only audit log. Use for manual human approvals or out-of-band escalations. Returns decision ID and timestamp.

tools.name: aci_recall_precedent
tools.title: Search Decision Precedents
tools.description: Semantic search over past governance decisions to find similar precedents. Returns top-K precedents with similarity scores and outcomes.

tools.name: aci_record_outcome
tools.title: Record Decision Outcome
tools.description: Record the actual outcome of a previously classified governance decision. Feeds the calibration loop to improve future classification accuracy.

tools.name: aci_estimate_blast_radius
tools.title: Estimate Blast Radius
tools.description: Estimate the blast radius of a proposed action -- affected systems, users, data records, cascade depth, and recovery time.

tools.name: aci_generate_rollback
tools.title: Generate Rollback Plan
tools.description: Generate a step-by-step rollback plan for a proposed action. Use before approving high-risk operations. Returns commands, durations, and prerequisites.

tools.name: aci_governance_health
tools.title: Governance Health Metrics
tools.description: Get aggregate governance health metrics. Returns classification distribution, calibration accuracy, false positive/negative rates, and overall health score.

tools.name: s2t_interview_create
tools.title: Create Interview Session
tools.description: Create a stakeholder interview session for S2T process discovery. Returns a session token for conducting the interview. Local tool -- no API key charges.

tools.name: s2t_interview_message
tools.title: Send Interview Message
tools.description: Send a message in an active interview session and receive the next adaptive question. Local tool -- no API key charges.

tools.name: s2t_interview_summary
tools.title: Generate Interview Summary
tools.description: Generate an AI summary from an interview session's transcript. Includes key findings, pain points, time/cost estimates, and prioritized recommendations. Local tool -- no API key charges.

tools.name: s2t_interview_list
tools.title: List Interview Sessions
tools.description: List all interview sessions with optional status filter. Returns session metadata including customer name, stakeholder, and creation time. Local tool -- no API key charges.
